title: Poly Pizza
description: Explore and download stylized 3D models for use in XR and game development.
educational: Students can search and incorporate free-to-use 3D assets into XR, game design, or digital art projects.

title: Hubs by Mozilla
description: Create shared 3D spaces for meetings, events, or educational walkthroughs — all in your browser.
educational: Great for virtual classrooms, student collaboration, and presentations in immersive environments.

title: Sketchfab
description: Browse millions of interactive 3D models and view them in WebXR-enabled browsers.
educational: Art and science instructors can use Sketchfab to embed and explore 3D structures and artworks.

title: Access Mars
description: Explore the surface of Mars using real imagery captured by NASA's Curiosity rover.
educational: Perfect for astronomy and earth science classes to visualize planetary exploration.

title: SculptGL
description: Free browser-based 3D sculpting app — like a virtual clay studio.
educational: Students can experiment with form and shape using virtual sculpting tools from any device.
